DeKALB  Phi Beta Sigma Fraternity Inc.s annual Frat Attack competition returns after a fouryear hiatus PERIOD The men of Phi Beta Sigma will host their step competition Friday.Frat Attack is a competition unlike any other on NIUs campus.. PERIOD

Eugene Marshall Kappa Alphi Psi president poses with the fraternitys cane PERIOD He said Kappas are dedicated to uplifting society PERIOD

Campus Activities Board LMO and Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity will hold the Masters of the Mix Faceoff Edition DJ battle  p.m PERIOD March  in the Holmes Student Center Carl Sandburg Auditorium.DJ Pharris from Power  is lined up to be master of ceremonies.. PERIOD

Alumni of the Epsilon Phi chapter of Alpha Phi Alpha are celebrating the fiftieth anniversary of the chapters founding through their motto of First of All Servants of All We Shall Transcend All.Alpha Phi Alphas Epsilon Phi chapter was established.. PERIOD

While nationally enthusiasm for this years presidential election might have simmered down from  the amount of involvement students at NIU took in politics this time around was inspiring PERIOD During the final weeks of national campaigning there were.. PERIOD

Over  people gathered at the MLK Commons yesterday to break the ice against violence at an event hosted by Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity PERIOD Alandis Phillips senior sociology major and president of Alpha Phi Alpha said to break the ice means.. PERIOD

The Center for Black Studies has postponed its program featuring speaker Pat Reid Merritt who was scheduled to give a lecture at the Regency Room in the Holmes Student Center Thursday PERIOD The new date will be announced on a later date PERIOD The Miss Black and.. PERIOD

The Northern Star is the studentproduced independent media at Northern Illinois University in DeKalb Ill PERIOD and is a limited public forum whose content is determined exclusively by its student editors PERIOD Information presented on this website and in its print products is not controlled by NIU administration faculty or staff PERIOD The Star publishes online at northernstar.info and sends out its TLDR newsletter Monday through Friday PERIOD
